feature1Title.en: Offer the best prices across different chains.
feature1Title.zh: 发现不同链上最好的价格

feature1Detail1.en: i. Aggregate liquidity sources across leading DEXs.
feature1Detail1.zh: i. 聚合不同链上领先的DEXs

feature1Detail2.en: Ii. Discover the most efficient trading routes.
feature1Detail2.zh: Ii. 智能化推荐最有效的交易路线

feature1Detail3.en: Iii. Ensure secure transactions without hidden fees.
feature1Detail3.zh: Iii. 安全交易没有隐藏费用

feature2Title.en: Trade across chains by one click.

feature2Detail1.en: I. Link to different blockchain networks.
feature2Detail1.zh: I. 链接不同区块链网络

feature2Detail2.zh: Ii. 多链资产自由兑换

roadmapQ2Q3Detail1.en: Launch the bridge module. Provide cross-chain service.
roadmapQ2Q3Detail1.zh: 上线 bridge 模块，提供跨链服务

roadmapQ2Q3Detail2.zh: Swap 支持 ETH，BSC 网络

roadmapQ2Q3Detail3.en: Release O3 Swap token and economic model.
roadmapQ2Q3Detail3.zh: 发行 O3 Swap 治理 token 与经济模型

roadmapQ2Q3Detail4.en: Launch trade mining and other community incentives.
roadmapQ2Q3Detail4.zh: 开启交易挖矿与其他社区激励

roadmapQ4Detail2.zh: 启动 Layer2 版本开发与部署

roadmap2022Detail1.en: Release V2. Support instant quote and pending order.
roadmap2022Detail1.zh: 发布V2，支持即时询价，挂单交易
